description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Picturesque America; or, the Land we live in. A delineation by pen and pencil of the mountains, rivers, lakes ... cities and other picturesque features of our country. With illustrations ... by eminent American artists. Edited by W. C. Bryant", "Single Works" Author: BRYANT, William Cullen. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.h.18." Volume: 01 Page: 489 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1872 Publisher: D. Appleton & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000510819 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
